vpn-l2tp.popup-description:
The VPN server allows authorized users to connect to resources on the home network via the Internet and allows them to use your home Internet connection.
Select the users to whom you want to allow access to your VPN server.

psk.label: Shared IPsec key
psk.warning: This shared key is also used by IPsec Virtual IP server

nat.label: NAT for clients
nat.description: For access of the VPN server's clients to the Internet

validation.user-ip-is-not-unique: This IP is already in use
